005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.IFeatureValueConstrained;
009
010import java.util.Locale;
011
012import javax.xml.namespace.QName;
013
014import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
015import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
016
017public interface IDefinition extends INamedModelElement, IAttributable, IFeatureValueConstrained {
018
019  @NonNull
020  ModuleScopeEnum DEFAULT_DEFINITION_MODEL_SCOPE = ModuleScopeEnum.INHERITED;
021
022  /**
023   * Retrieve the definition's scope within the context of its defining module.
024   *
025   * @return the module scope
026   */
027  @NonNull
028  default ModuleScopeEnum getModuleScope() {
029    return ModuleScopeEnum.LOCAL;
030  }
031
032  /**
033   * The qualified name for the definition.
034   * <p>
035   * This name is the combination of the definition's namespace, which is the
036   * module's namespace, and the definition's name.
037   *
038   * @return the definition's qualified name
039   */
040  @NonNull
041  default QName getDefinitionQName() {
042    return new QName(
043        getContainingModule().getXmlNamespace().toASCIIString(),
044        getName());
045  }
046
047  /**
048   * Determine if the definition is defined inline, meaning the definition is
049   * declared where it is used.
050   *
051   * @return {@code true} if the definition is declared inline or {@code false} if
052   *         the definition is able to be globally referenced
053   */
054  default boolean isInline() {
055    return getInlineInstance() != null;
056  }
057
058  /**
059   * If {@link #isInline()} is {@code true}, return the instance the definition is
060   * inlined for.
061   *
062   * @return the instance or {@code null} otherwise
063   */
064  INamedInstance getInlineInstance();
065
066  /**
067   * Generates a coordinate string for the provided information element
068   * definition.
069   *
070   * A coordinate consists of the element's:
071   * <ul>
072   * <li>containing Metaschema's short name</li>
073   * <li>model type</li>
074   * <li>name</li>
075   * <li>hash code</li>
076   * </ul>
077   *
078   * @return the coordinate
079   */
080  @SuppressWarnings("null")
081  @Override
082  default String toCoordinates() {
083    return String.format("%s:%s-definition:%s(%d)",
084        getContainingModule().getShortName(),
085        getModelType().toString().toUpperCase(Locale.ROOT),
086        getName(),
087        hashCode());
088  }
089
090  /**
091   * Get the resource location information for the provided item, if known.
092   *
093   * @param itemValue
094   *          the item to get the location information for
095   *
096   * @return the resource location information, or {@code null} if not known
097   */
098  @Nullable
099  default IResourceLocation getLocation(@NonNull Object itemValue) {
100    return itemValue instanceof IBoundObject ? ((IBoundObject) itemValue).getMetaschemaData() : null;
101  }
102}
